name: Top 100 Steam Games
content:
Description: This dataset contains information about the top 100 popular games on Steam in July 2024, a leading digital distribution platform for PC gaming. It includes details such as game rank, image links, titles, current player count, 24-hour peak player count, all-time peak player count, and genre.

[Source](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/devildyno/top-100-steam-games-july-2024)

Columns:

* Rank (numerical): Ranking of the game based on current player count.
* Image Link (link): URL link to the game's image
* Title (string): Name of the game
* Current (numerical): Current number of players
* 24th Peak (numerical): Highest number of players within the last 24 hours
* All-Time Peak (numerical): Highest number of players recorded for the game
* Genre (string): Genre of the game
